summary: Implements a configurable recurrent neural network encoder for automatic speech recognition, supporting selectable RNN cell types, optional bidirectional layers, projection after each layer, and multiple subsampling methods to generate compact, streaming‑compatible acoustic feature representations.
business_intent: Provide a low‑latency, resource‑efficient acoustic encoder that enables real‑time speech‑to‑text applications on mobile or edge devices following a proven streaming ASR architecture.
